alert.note: Alert for Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 3:59AM MST until July 24 at 4:30AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 AM MST FOR EASTERN PINAL COUNTY... At 358 AM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near to south of Hayden, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Oracle, Mammoth, San Manuel, Kearny, Dudleyville, Aravaipa Canyon Wilderness, Cactus Forest and Kelvin. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
